Miles Sound System SDK 6.1c

MILES_MDI_DRIVER_TYPE

The basic type MILES_MDI_DRIVER_TYPE describes the type of DOS MIDI driver.

Fundamental Values

 Value  Description
 MDIDRVRTYPE_GM General MIDI synthesis. Typically wavetable, enhanced FM, or physical-model synthesis with at least 24 available voices. This type of driver does not require an XMIDI Global Timbre Library file.
 MDIDRVRTYPE_FM_2 2-operator (Yamaha YM3812/OPL2-equivalent) FM synthesis. These drivers require XMIDI Global Timbre Library files with the suffix .AD. 9 FM voices are provided by this synthesis technology.
 MDIDRVRTYPE_FM_4 4-operator (Yamaha YMF262/OPL3-equivalent) FM synthesis. This technology offers up to 18 2-operator voices or 6 4-operator voices. Global Timbre Library files with the suffix .OPL are required for use with this type of driver.
 MDIDRVRTYPE_SPKR PC or Tandy internal speaker synthesis. Drivers of this type offer exceptionally poor sound quality and limited channel and controller response. No Global Timbre Library file format is supported. Few applications should include drivers of this type (which include TANDY.MDI and PCSPKR.MDI), as little market demand remains for this level of technology.


Group: XMIDI Services
Related Functions: AIL_MDI_driver_type
